tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āmantrayate sma /
karmāvaraṇaṃ maitreya kṣapayitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ samādānaṃ kartavyaṃ yathā ebhiḥ kulaputraiḥ kṛtam iti //
iha maitreya bodhisatvena mahāsatvena rāgasaṃjanano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
lābhālābhatayā unnāmāvanāmakaro lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /  mohotpādano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
kulamātsaryādhyavasāno lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /  ātmārthaniṣpādanatayā śāṭhyotpādano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /

mānamadotpādano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /  gurūṇām avamānano lābhasatkāraḥ /  mārapakṣo lābhasatkāraḥ /  ekāntapramādamūlaḥ kuśalamūlāpaharaṇo lābhasatkāraḥ /  vidyuccakrāśanisadṛśo lābhasatkāraḥ /
pūrvaṃ satkārapaścād asatkārakaraṇaḥ /  amitrasatkaraṇamitraprahāṇo lābhasatkāraḥ /  parābhisaṃdhānatayā gaṇikāsadṛśaḥ /
ime evaṃrūpā maitreya lābhasatkāre ādīnavā ye bodhisatvena pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
alpecchasya hi maitreya imae evaṃrūpā doṣā na bhavanti na cāsyāntarāyā bhavanti buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
asaṃhāryaś ca bhavati māraviṣayavimuktaḥ /  adharṣaṇīyaś ca bhavati sarvavyasanaiḥ /
spaṣṭaś ca bhavati māyāśāṭhyaprahīṇo 'pramattaś ca bhavati pañcakāmaguṇadoṣadarśī yathāvādī tathākārī bhavaty āryavaṃśe sthitaḥ /
imāṃ maitreya evaṃrūpām anuśaṃsāṃ viditvā paṇḍitena bodhisatvenādhyāśayenālpecchatāyāṃ rantavyaṃ /
saṃgaṇikām adhikṛtyāha /  vijahya rāgaṃ vijahya doṣaṃ na tiṣṭhate saṃgaṇikāsu yogī /
saṃkīrṇacārī hi bhavaty asaṃvṛtaḥ /  karoti yaḥ saṃgaṇikām asārām //
hīyanti cehāgrakathāsu bālāḥ /  pradoṣa vardhenti vitarka utsadā /
na vardhate cāpi śrutena bhikṣuḥ /  ayuktamantreṣu ratiṃ janitvā /
sahasraśo 'ṣṭhāni mayā svakāni /  tyaktāni bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣa tarhi /
na cāsmi tṛptaḥ śṛṇumāna dharmaṃ /  te khedam eṣyanti śṛṇonta dharmam //
na tasya jātū dṛḍha buddhi bhotī /
bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ // pe //
bhuktvā tvacaṃ neha punaḥ saśakyaṃ /  labdhuṃ nareṇekṣurasaṃ pradhānam //
tasmād dhi bhāṣye tu ratiṃ vihāya /
viheṭhayante ca vane vasantaṃ yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti //
adharmakāyaś ca sa bhoti bhūyo yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti //
